attributes.action: Vote of 'No Confidence' in Government to protect British People
attributes.additional_details: We, the people of this great nation should hold our government personally responsible for this horrific Islamic terrorist attack. They have compromised this nations homeland security for long enough and they continue to do so, by not dealing with Islamists. I vote NO CONFIDENCE in any of the three main political parties. They are GUILTY of betraying OUR citizens, OUR soldiers and the memories of OUR war dead..........GUILTY!!!!!
